attributes.action: Is the Media a Tool for Terrorism?
attributes.additional_details:
As part of my Citizenship GCSE Courework, I have been asked to carry out research into a Citizenship issue that I think is important. I have chosen the topic of "Is the Media a Tool for Terrorism".

Due to convenience and broad reach of social media platforms, such as: Youtube, Twitter, Facebook, etc. Terrorist Groups, like Isis and Al-Qaeda, have been abusing them to garner publicity and recruit overseas. For example, the 3 East London Schoolgirls who have flown overseas to join the Islamic State terrorist group.

Through this petition, I hope to not only raise awareness of this issue, but to help prevent things such as this occuring in the future. I suggest we take action, by removing/ blocking the videos online and by removing/ blocking the social media accounts that have been promoting the terrorist groups and their actions.

Thank you for your time,
Cameron Smith
Chatham Grammar School for Boys
